Social And Cultural Activities: Involved in social work and strived for the upliftment of downtrodden and poor; some of the works undertaken include, (i) Massive free plantation scheme worth one crore rupees, undertaken in Karimnagar in 2004; (ii) construction of several homes for muslim minorities; (iii) supply of drinking water to 145 habitants affected by floods in Siddiepet constituency
Special Interests: Writing and service to the poor
Educational Qualifications: M.A. (Literature) Educated at Osmania University, Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh
Name: Rao,Shri Kalva Kuntla Chandrasekhar
Positions Held:
1985-2004
Member, Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly (four terms)

1987-88
Minister of State, Govt. of Andhra Pradesh

1992-93

1997-99

1999-2001

2004
Elected to 14th Lok Sabha

2004-06

23 Sept. 2006
Resigned from Lok Sabha

7 Dec. 2006
Re-elected to 14th Lok Sabha in bye-election

3 March 2008
Resigned from Lok Sabha


2009
Re-elected to 15th Lok Sabha (2nd term)
Leader, Telangana Rashtra Samithi Parliamentary Party, Lok Sabha

Member, Committee on Energy

23 Sept. 2009
